event_name.description: must be a string and is required

event_cover_img_url.description: must be a string and can be empty

event_type.description: must be a string and is required

start_time.description: must be a timestamp and is required

event_date.description: must be a date and is required

event_organiser.description: must be an ObjectId and is required

event_location.description: must be a string and is required

event_address.description: must be a string and is required

event_details.description: must be a string and is required

attendees.description: must be an array of objectId and can be empty

num_of_attendees.description: must be an integer and is required

max_attendees.description: must be an integer and is required

is_special.description: must be a Boolean and is required
